mapper.insert: insert into address(id,adrname,receiver,tel1,tel2,tel3,phone1,phone2,phone3,address1,address2,address3) values( #{id},#{adrName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{receiver},#{tel1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tel2, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tel3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone1},#{phone2},#{phone3},#{address1},#{address2},#{address3})
